Package chess

Class ChessBoardCell

  • java.lang.Object
    • chess.ChessBoardCell
  • public class ChessBoardCell
extends java.lang.Object
    Class representing the cell of a ChessBoard. A cell in chessboard can have a specific color and can optionally contains a chessPiece
    Author:
    Dev Patel and Eric Chan

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ChessBoardCell​(int row, int col, boolean whiteCell)
      Create a cell wiht given row,col index and color
      ChessBoardCell​(int row, int col, boolean whiteCell, ChessPiece piece)
      Method to create the cell with specific color and piece on the specific row/col index.
      ChessBoardCell​(ChessBoardCell other)
      method to create the copy of a cell with the piece.
